title: 6.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a program that deals with the details of three cities, including their populations and literacy rates.

Create three types of arrays:
● A String type array to store the names of the cities.
● An int type array to store the population of each city.
● A double type array to store the literacy rate of each city.
● Make sure to keep the array elements in the same order so that the corresponding cities,populations, and literacy rates are aligned. (These are known as parallel arrays.)
● Print the arrays along with their length.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
